title: Cryptomultiplier
author: Cryptomultiplier
content: Web3, ChatGPT and the dominance of Bitcoin has opened my eyes to possibilities of the future.The Blockchain technology has offered succor to many recent innovations, but the fear of over reliance on the features which it supports lately, has led countless content creators to express concerns over the future of human work, life, relationships and investments.It is adviced to match up with the skill set required to stay relevant, so as to benefit from these innovations which threathen to replace human input and intelligence. Web3, ChatGPT, cryptocurrency are some examples of innovations that has reshaped or is reshaping the society and over time, humans would have to do tasks that these AI bots would take years to learn and perform, inorder to survive and foot bills now. Some skills one should look to learn and possess inorder to remain relevant and earn money to foot bills and survive includes;1. Investing in Soft Skills which bother on communication, adaptability, and leadership. This is essential in this age of Al, so as to complement technical expertise and enable one navigate dynamic work environments.2. Al-related Careers should be considered when opting for a profitable career direction at an early time. One should consider careers in Al development, data science, or machine learning to influence Al technology's direction and ensure ethical implementation.3. Developing Emotional Intelligence (EQ) & Creativity should for one never be downplayed as AI has none of these real attributes and it is a distinguishing feature that sets humans apart from artificial intelligence.Take time to cultivate EQ and creativity to generate unique ideas and solutions that Al cannot replicate.4. Never stop Learning no matter your age or disposition at the time. The ability to keep a curious mindset filled with knowledge is what will make one relevant in this competitive and AI driven world.5. The urgency to act on this or any information is to secure a spot that even AI cannot fill, because asexperts predict, Al could displace 75 million jobs by 2025. It is safer to make haste and invest in whatever skills worth learning today, so as to safeguard your career against this rapid technological advancements.*Was this reading insightful?*Are there any other ways or careers that would make one remain relevant despite the advent of AI technology?
